page.title: 03Our School in Cliffe
page.content: Our school is called St.Helen's First School and it was first built in 1972. There are 153 children in our school, in five classes.We start school when we are five years old and leave when we are nine.Our school building is rectangular in shape and is one storey high.In the middle of the school we have a hall which is used for assembly,P.E.,packed lunches and school dinners.Around the hall we have five classrooms,three spare rooms,a television room,a library,staffroom, office and kitchens.We have five teachers,a headmaster,two part-time secretaries,a caretaker,a cleaner, three cooks and four dinner ladies.In our class there are 36 children.
